Set the number of Species spec in Compartment comp.

Set the number of Species spec in Compartment comp. The distributing is weighted with the volume or area fraction of elements: bigger elements get a higher amount of molecules. With DistributionMethod.UNIFORM (default), the distribution is deterministic (apart from roundings) and the number of molecules per element is e.g. n*V_tet/V_tot. With DistributionMethod.MULTINOMIAL the distribution is multinomial and the probability of putting a species in an element is e.g. V_tet/V_tot.
Set the concentration (in M) of Species spec in Compartment comp.

With DistributionMethod.MULTINOMIAL the distribution is multinomial and the probability of putting a species in an element is e.g. V_tet/V_tot.
